CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high energy alignment would not enable to achieve a large open - circuit voltage and is eventually detrimental to the PCE output of PT - based PSCs such as in P3HT / PCBM systems with PCE ranging from 3 to 4% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| PCBM |
| PCE |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| PCBM |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "high energy alignment" (this is a general term and not a specific material name)
* "PCE" (this is an abbreviation for "power conversion efficiency" and not a material name)

Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high energy alignment would not enable to achieve a large open - circuit voltage and is eventually detrimental to the PCE output of PT - based PSCs such as in P3HT / PCBM systems with PCE ranging from 3 to 4% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high energy alignment |
| large open - circuit voltage |
| PCE output of PT - based PSCs |
| PCE ranging from 3 to 4% |

Note that I have presented the entities exactly as they appear in the original paragraph, including any punctuation and capitalization.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |

| large open - circuit voltage |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to the value of a material property:

* "PCE ranging from 3 to 4%" - this is a range of values, not a single property value.
* "such" - this is a conjunction used to introduce a subordinate clause, and does not refer to a material property value.
